name: MyRecordedAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open my recorded affirmations”
”Alexa, start my recorded affirmations”

skdetail:

Invocation Name: my recorded affirmations
Developer Terms of Use
des: Your recorded affirmations will be mixed with 50 more affirmations so that you can listen to a variety of affirmations for the success in the field that you would like to have.
